title: Beef
text: Grilled filet mignon with red wine garlic sauce, served with fennel potato gratin and roasted asparagus

title: Chicken
text: Herb & garlic seared chicken with meyer lemon sauce, served over rice pilaf with almonds & peas, and sautéed kale

title: Vegetarian
text: Pesto lasagna with grilled zucchini, cherry tomatoes & ricotta, served with sautéed rainbow chard
